query:
-- Assign checklists to task 1 (first task in the system)
INSERT INTO taskChecklists (taskId, templateId, assignedBy, assignedAt, status, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES 
  (1, 1, 1, NOW(), 'pending', NOW(), NOW()),
  (1, 2, 1, NOW(), 'pending', NOW(), NOW());
